Name: Poozle Mania
About the game: Looking for a fun and lewd game to kill some time? You found it! Poozle is casual, logic fun with hundreds of hours of gameplay. It's heartfelt, charming and sexy! So what are you waiting for? Play it now! Please don't forget to add Poozle to your wishlist! What you will find in the game: Beautiful animations of girls. The best animated wallpapers and avatars on the whole Steam! Awesome sound and visual effects. Gallery with your collection of girls. This game can be played with one hand, too! Available in more than 10 languages! Lots of levels to play. The rules of the game are very simple: Your task is to assemble balls of the same color into horizontal, vertical or diagonal rows of at least five balls. A ball is selected by clicking on it and moved there by clicking on an empty square. However, there must be a path of empty fields between the selectected squares. ______________________________________________ Hello! We are Shmoops.games - a super small independent game dev studio passionate about making 18+ games! We will be very grateful if you support us by telling your friends about the game or by sending us your feedback. This will help us improve our games and start working on the next ones. Thank you!
